isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 2000, 4000, 8000 - CHASSIS ACCESSORIES - OPERATION - Air Dryer (Bendix AD-9)

svcproc.title: Air Dryer (Bendix AD-9)
svcproc.para: When the key switch (24) is placed in the ignition or accessory position, power is applied to circuit 12, accessory feed block (J2), circuit 12A, fuse F14, circuit 39, connector (13), and black wire to air dryer. The ground path is through the white wire to cab ground.

If the air dryer thermostat senses air temperature below 10°C (50°F), its contacts will close, allowing current to flow through the heating element. When the thermostat senses a temperature of 29.4°C (85°F), the contacts will open up, interrupting the current flow.
